summary: Diff adds a new EndingGameSlide component and updates Slideshow to render it as the final slide instead of the teddy mini-game. The new game appears to support mouse and touch interactions, includes English instructions, visual feedback (hearts/sparkles), progression toward a goal, and a completion/reset flow. There are also unrelated/extra edits (e.g., TeddyGameSlide and global CSS/theme updates).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified TeddyGameSlide even though the BuildRequest only required replacing it on the final slide (not changing its implementation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on replacing the final-slide experience and wiring a new component; no requirement asks to alter TeddyGameSlide itself.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/changed global romantic theme tokens and added multiple new animations/utilities in global CSS.
hallucinated_features.reason: While potentially supportive of the new ending gameâ€™s visuals, the BuildRequest did not explicitly request global theme/token refactoring or additional site-wide animations beyond implementing the new ending mini-game.
